REQUEST: JapanScenery Vol.1

Just a FYI, I had some trouble burning this with AL-120%__ no data reconized on disc__ and couldn't mount image with AL-120% either.

I ended up using MagicISO to extract the files from the .ISO to a folder and then ran the setup__ Demon tools works as well.

All in All I got it installed ;)

Thanks for the upload__T.W.
Really? That's interesting. Which version of Alcohol are you using? It mounted and later burned just fine for me with 3823.

@ draco7891__ Version 1.9.5 ( Build 3105 ) and burning with a Pioneer R100 DVD model# 110D,__ it's a fairly new drive out so that maybe the problem.

I have  (Build 3823)__ Just too damn lazy to install it.

Did you have RMPS (Recordable Media Physical 
Signature) Enable when you created the image 
by chance?

T.W.

Nope, no special settings. There's no protection on the disc, so it's not too picky about copying.

Oh well, as long as it works, right :)

@ draco7891___ Oh not a problem mate!__ it's working just fine__ I believe most of the problem is my cracked version of Alcohol 120__ I can't mount any image files, so I've downloaded the latest version from TPB, should take care of the problem.

Anyway Draco, the upload was greatly appreciated___ T.W. ;)
